Player History
Earned first career win on 8/16/1982...
Injured on 9/18/1983 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 4/6/1986 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1986, going 2-1, 1.11...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1986, going 5-0, 1.25...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 9/19/1986, off Harold Miller (CBC)...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1986, going 19-9, 2.52 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/13/1987 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 10/15/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/4/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/6/1989 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 5/7/1990 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/15/1990 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.64 ERA...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/9/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $2,450,000 per year...
Injured on 5/11/1992 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/1992 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
